_header: Mercy God of my misdeed / For Thy mercy that mickle is
Note: With Latin quotations at head of each stanza, first, ‘Miserere mei deus secundum magnam misericordiam tuam; for other MSS containing all seven of the Penitential Psalms see 3207 and 5978.
Subjects: psalms, penitential; scripture texts, paraphrases; paraphrases
_description: Maydestone’s paraphrase of the Fifty-first Psalm — twenty 8-line stanzas (abababab)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
…So let me neuere werk bi ginneLord but ȝif hit like
                    þe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor teres þat his Modur wepteHe schylde vs alle from
                    helle fere
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
Lines 1-22 missing due to loss of folios 106-113; in 8-line stanzas,
                    abababab.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Minor Poems of the Vernon Manuscript, Part 1.
EETS
         o.s. 98 (1892; repr. 1973): 12-16.

Mercy god of my mysdedeVp þi mercy þat mechel
                    is…
BodDou141.Last Lines:
…ffor teres þat hys moder wepteHe schylde vs alle fro
                    helle fere

BodRawC891.First Lines:
Mercy god of my mysdede vp þy mercy þat mechel
                    ys…
BodRawC891.Last Lines:
…þat ho so cryeþ tho þe merci ys endeles [ ] In
                    þi memorye

CULDd11.First Lines:
Merci lord god of my mysdedefor thi mercy þat mekil
                    is…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…for þe teris his moder weptehe schilde vs alle fro
                        here helle fere

BLAdd10036.First Lines:
Mercy god of my mysdedeffor þi mercy þat myschef
                    ys…
BLAdd10036.Last Lines:
…ffor þo teeris þat þi modre wepteThow schelde
                    fro þe fendes fere amen
